body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 4 – improved 4-second color video previews plus easy installation, and enhanced wifi – 2021 release
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 4 is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device. Certified Refurbished Amazon devices may be packaged in generic Amazon-branded boxes.
1080p HD video doorbell with improved video previews and battery life.
All-new Color Pre-Roll Video Previews of all motion events means you’ll never miss a moment at your front door, day or night.
Enjoy customizable privacy zones and audio privacy, enhanced dual-band (2.4 or 5.0 GHz) wifi connectivity, and improved motion detection.
Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
Powered by a removable, rechargeable battery pack or connects to existing doorbell wires for constant power. Works on any home.
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos.
Save and share video and photos with an optional Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately).

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1080 HD Live Video, Live View, Night Vision. Video quality for the color Pre-Roll feature is less than 1080p.

productInformation.name: Motion detection
productInformation.value: Motion detection Advanced Motion Detection with Customizable Motion Zones

productInformation.name: Audio
productInformation.value: Two-way audio with noise cancellation. Pre-Roll does not include audio.

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Runs on a removable, rechargeable, Quick-Release Battery Pack (included). Can be hardwired to an existing doorbell system or transformer for continuous charging (8-24 VAC, 40VA max, 50/60Hz) or connected to a Ring plug-in adapter. No halogen or garden-lighting transformers; no DC transformer/power supply. *Improved battery life is based on an average of 20 or more motion events per day as compared to Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus. Battery life will vary based on device settings, use, and environmental factors.

productInformation.name: Internet requirements
productInformation.value: Recommended minimum upload speed of 2 Mbps per device.

productInformation.name: Operating conditions
productInformation.value: -5°F to 120°F (-20°C to 50°C). Weather Resistant - when hardwired, the device allows charging in the range of 32°F to 113°F (0° to 45°C), otherwise charging is disabled.

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 5.1 in. x 2.4 in x 1.1 in (128mm x 62mm x 28mm)

productInformation.name: Box Includes
productInformation.value: Video Doorbell 4 Rechargeable, Quick-Release Battery Pack Satin Nickel faceplate Corner Kit Installation Tools and Screws USB Charging Cable Quick Start Guide User Manual Security Sticker

productInformation.name: Setup requirements
productInformation.value: Only if wiring: Standard doorbell system, Ring plug-in adapter or transformer with 8-24 VAC, 40VA max, 50/60Hz or 24VDC, 0.5A, 12W

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices. Use of Ring Video Doorbell 4 is subject to the terms found here.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Ring Video Doorbell 4 support page.

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid camera doorbell so far and excellent support from amazon.
reviews.reviewText: I had an issue with the first unit I ordered where the video feed was tinted really purple for some reason. Amazon replaced it for me and the new unit works excellently! Motion is detected perfectly, the video is clean, and night vision works as it should. Definitely a good buy, and I'm confidant that any porch pirates will be caught in fhd!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my Blink
reviews.reviewText: About a year ago, I purchased a Blink doorbell. It worked OK but it would take 20 or more seconds to access the camera with the phone app. This was a detriment if I needed to communicate with someone on the front porch in a reasonable amount of time. Some folks just up and left because it took me so long to answer on the app. After all this, I decided to pay a little more and invest in a Ring Doorbell 4. I am so glad I did. It was extremely easy to install and there is plenty of hardware included for many installation scenarios. It was easy to set up and, oh my goodness, I can now access the camera with the app in within just a few seconds. The resolution and picture quality is pretty decent as well. Not the best on the market but very good for the price. If you are torn between getting a Blink or a Ring, do yourself a favor and go with the Ring. Keep in mind that each of the Ring doorbell models has different capabilities. Some will not work with a 5Ghz router. This one works with either 2.4Ghz or 5Ghz routers. I have three Ring devices now and am very pleased with all of them. Just in case you are wondering, the Blink did find a home at the back door and is working OK there as a camera and family doorbell. To be fair to Blink, however, there may be better models than the one I purchased so do your research and ask a lot of questions. All I know is that all of my Ring devices work as they should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the app makes install so easy
reviews.reviewText: the ring app on phone goes step by step with video and pictures to make install pretty easy for anybody.The devices work together.

reviews.reviewText: Nice, but had a issue with the battery. But ring did replace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Half the parts don't work
reviews.reviewText: I knew I should NEVER EVER BUY A REFURBISHED PRODUCT!!! Amazon swears this product has been checked out by everyone except GOD himself but let me tell you this doorbell is a nightmare from hates. First problem, the screws on the back that are supposed to loosen so you can connect the wires from your house to the doorbell, whoever put them on they are unremoveable. You cannot loosen them, not even with an drill, it just stripped the screws they are on there so tight. I could not believe it. You are supposed to charge the batteries to full charge, they have been charging now for almost 12 hours and they are still not charged, how long do they have to charge? If I had not already attached this thing to the outside of my house, which was a mistake, because it was a huge problem for me to put this thing up. I would be returning it. I was not able to connect it to my home because the screws were not able to be loosen, so far the batteries will not charge. NEVER, EVER, AGAIN will I BUY ANYTHING REFURBISHED JUST BECAUSE OF THIS CRAP!! SCREWS ON TOO TIGHT AND BATTERIES THAT WILL NOT CHARGE!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did what it stated it would do.
